title: Design of Cognitive-Emotional Integrated Multimodal Mathematics Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Fractions, Decimals, Ratios, etc.)
context.additional_context: Job-integrated mathematics education for medical/legal/technical professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 80% of real-world job problem-solving processes using multimodal resources (text/graphics/audio)
Learners provide three or more peer feedback sessions via online collaboration tools and engage in cognitive-emotional interactions
Learners achieve over 75% proficiency in real-time simulation assessments after completing a pretraining module
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
